name: Above: The Fallen
description: Above: The Fallen is a 2D side-scrolling, puzzle - platformer game that is centered around travelling upwards instead of to the left or right. The goal is to climb the trees of an ancient and mystical forest in order to break through the canopy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommend Gamepad Support
